data.name: Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All - Stargazer Bundle
data.detailed_description:
The Stargazer Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All adds a custom galaxy-themed paint job, new rims, body kits, a paint bundle, and the Black Arrow parachute. Just be sure to keep your eyes on the road while you look to the stars.

*Must own Caro RC vehicle to apply new body kits.
data.about_the_game:
The Stargazer Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All adds a custom galaxy-themed paint job, new rims, body kits, a paint bundle, and the Black Arrow parachute. Just be sure to keep your eyes on the road while you look to the stars.

*Must own Caro RC vehicle to apply new body kits.
data.short_description: The Stargazer Bundle for Street Outlaws 2: Winner Takes All add a custom galaxy-themed Paint job, new rims, body kits, a paint bundle, and the Black Arrow parachute. Just be sure to keep your eyes on the road while you look to the stars.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7400 @ 3GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 (64bit version only)
  • Processor: Ryzen 7 2700 X @ 3.7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
